text:
Exabeam | Bay Area, California | Full time | On site

Seeking multiple positions:

--------------------------

Web Front-End Engineer (San Francisco, CA):

--------------------------

Design and develop a rich user interface for a mission critical data processing and analytics application using Web front-end technologies.

--------------------------------

Platform Engineer/Sr. Engineer (San Mateo, CA):

--------------------------------

Design and develop various platform components using latest technologies and coding in Scala.

To get in touch, send an email to ziad@exabeam.com
